name: JDungeon (jannik323)
description:
a 3D rogue-like action game with strong inspiration from "the binding of isaac".

Move around with  W,A,S,D (can be changed in the settings) and shoot at enemies using your mouse! Explore the randomly generated floor and collect as many items and collectables to defeat the final boss of the floor !  Get stronger as you advance further down the dungeon and become the ultimate jdungeon player !

You can currently:

 fight against 10 enemies
defeat 2 bosses
find 20+ items
explore 25+ different rooms
enjoy an infinite amount of different playthroughs (this one might not be accurate)

Expect more things to get added , as I have only recently started working on this game 👍.
